org.fruit.alayer

Interface Canvas

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AWTCanvas, OverrideCanvas

    public interface Canvas
    A Canvas is a surface onto which you can draw e.g. lines, rectangles and circles. It serves as a way to visualize e.g. Action's and the Shape of Widget's.
    See Also:
    Pen, Visualizer
